titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson, Jr., Receipt to T. I. & J. R. Page
CWG13722

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 4

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky, --
To T. I. & J. R. Page Dr.

row.cell: To 151/2 yds Calico for use of Adjt Genl Office @ 25c per yd
Pens & Thread, used in packing Governors messages in relations to Flags presented to the State by different Regiments

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the articles were furnished as stated: and that they were necessary for the public service.

Jno W Finnell
Adjt Genl ky vols
Received at Frankfort Ky, the 7 of July, 1863, of Jas F Robinson Jr, Quarter-master, Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Four Dollars and Thirty Seven Cents in full of the above account.

NO. 12.
No. 30 53 Abstract B K Qr. 186
T. J. & J. R. Page
Dollars 4 37/100
